title: Sportradar Announces Pricing of Public Offering of Class A Ordinary Shares by Selling Shareholders and Concurrent Share Repurchase
content: ST. GALLEN, Switzerland, April 24, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Sportradar Group AG (Nasdaq: SRAD) (Sportradar or the Company) today announced the pricing of the previously announced secondary public offâ€¦ [+9156 chars]
